title: Sleeping Beauty
brief_description: This production of the classic ballet, “Sleeping Beauty” is performed by the Australian Ballet. Performed live at The Victorian Arts Centre, October 9, 1984, this ballet in a prologue and three acts has the beautiful Christine Walsh dancing the role of Aurora with touches of tenderness and grace, and David Ashmole creating an outstanding Prince Florimund. Music is performed by The Elizabethan Melbourne Orchestra, conducted by Ritchie Hanna.
